name: Suspicious Gentle Sea Breeze
desc: A refreshing drink. A tidal wave of saltiness almost sweeps you off your feet, with not a single hint of sweet in the whole glass. Is this just a cup of blue-colored brine?

value.text: Decreases all party members' climbing and sprinting Stamina consumption by 15% for 900s. In Co-Op Mode, this effect only applies to your own character(s).
